episode.title: McLain v. Real Estate Board of New Orleans, Inc.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in 78-1501, McLain and others against the Real Estate Board of New Orleans Incorporated and others.

For reasons stated and an opinion filed with the clerk this morning the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is vacated and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the Court's opinion.
Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or the decision of the case.
